blkgirlmanifest: THIS! 👏🏾 Beyond the work that you do, just existing & surviving in this field as a Black non-binary femme is so vital. So glad you spoke on this & really hope other Black folks in the field hear you that legitimacy and success are ours too ✨
hillabeans: Ugh wtf. I am so sorry they did this to you my friend. I hope they will issue a retraction and apologize publicly.
kaibutterfield: I’m so sorry you were misgendered, Ericka. Thank you for all that you do to assert yourself. I didn’t have the language to express my gender until I started following you. Your work is truly life-changing 🌻💛
beyondrosetta: going to press w/o factchecking with you is so unprofessional!

aundreadd: So they get to be the “essential source for sexual wellness information” but can’t respect and credit you as an educator or even the very basic thing of properly identifying you. They should stick to online listicles like “what your penis shape says about how you like your coffee.”
